'''Mysterious Ore''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained from seven different locations throughout [[Fontaine]]. 

After obtaining the last one, they will automatically combine into {{Item|Arkhium Stock}} and the player will receive the {{Achievement|Come on out, Mystery Ore! Grant my wish!}} The Arkhium Stock may be used for the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[Arkhium Forge]]''.
